item.title: Rise above the ordinary — a data science reading list
item.description: An hour reading sprint a day to keep your knowledge broad and up-to-date

item.title: 3 Tips on Defining a Data Science Project Scope with Business
item.description: Never be in trouble for delivering the wrong thing at the wrong time to the wrong person.

item.title: 5 Reasons Why You Should Join Deep Learning Indaba 2019
item.description: In April this year, instead of organising my 20-something birthday party, I spent hours writing motivating emails to my company to convince them to send me to Deep Learning Indaba.
